pages.text: The Soulstealer is a powerful and mysterious weapon that is said to have the ability to steal the souls of its victims and manipulate their perceptions. It is believed to be a powerful tool of manipulation and relocation, able to fog the minds of those it targets to become blind to the presence of its wielder.

The exact nature and capabilities of the Soulstealer are scarcely understood, as it is a highly sought-after and elusive weapon that is said to be wielded only by the most powerful and sinister individuals.
